1361090.name: Restitched
1361090.description:
Note: This product is in development and subject to change. All content featured is from an in-development Alpha build of the game.

Level Editor / Community Content

Build new 2.5D platforming experiences with an extensive in-game level editor! Browse the community's creations via integration with Steam Workshop, or publish your own content for others to enjoy. In Restitched, user-generated content is the heart and soul.

The Wardrobe

Stuffy may be cute, but did you know they're also quite stylish? Dress your plush companion from head to toe by mixing and matching cosmetic items spanning multiple categories! You can even take advantage of the 'Design Tool' to recolor items and change their appearance.

Stuffy's Adventure

Join Stuffy on their defining adventure! In addition to the diverse community content, Restitched will offer a range of official worlds for you to explore. In these levels, you'll join Stuffy as they traverse worldwide themes in search of their roots. Meet new friends, face new foes, collect new assets, and 'restitch' communities unraveled at the hands of tyranny.

These levels are created entirely in-game using the level editor, and serve as a prime example of what's possible in Restitched!

Stuffy's Abilities

Always prepared for a challenge, Stuffy can take down foes and interact with the environment in several exciting ways! Push things around, climb along ledges, crawl through narrow openings... or use the Needle 'n Thread to slash down enemies and obstacles, swing across gaps, and pull things toward you!

Passionately Produced

As aspiring developers, hobbyist creatives, and gaming enthusiasts, Trixel Creative developers are building Restitched as a labor of love. Our team is fueled by passion and consists of industry professionals, students, hobbyists, newcomers, and more.

Restitched is a love letter to the user-generated content (UGC) and platforming genres, and our many wonderful, nostalgic, inspiring experiences within them!

英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
